patient_info: Muscle weakness,Pericardial effusion,Abnormal tricuspid valve morphology,Palpitations,Vomiting,Abdominal pain,Dyspnea,Exercise intolerance,Poor appetite,Vascular tortuosity,Atrial fibrillation,Tricuspid regurgitation,Pedal edema,Right bundle branch block,Abnormal ST segment,Left ventricular systolic dysfunction,Right atrial enlargement,Increased circulating NT-proBNP concentration,Left atrial enlargement,Abnormality of internal jugular vein
golden_diagnosis: Cardiomyopathy, familial restrictive, 1,家族性/特发性限制型心肌病/Familial/Idiopathic restrictive cardiomyopathy,Cardiomyopathy, familial restrictive, 3,Cardiomyopathy, dilated, 1KK,Cardiomyopathy, familial hypertrophic, 26
predict_diagnosis:
1. Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
2. End-stage renal disease (ERD) with tricuspid valve defect and pulmonary arteriovenous malformations (PAVM)
3. Alzheimer's disease with vascular dementia
4. Congestive heart failure (CHF) with atrial fibrillation and right bundle branch block
5. Pulmonary hypertension with pulmonary artery dilation and right atrial enlargement
6. Mitochondrial encephalomyopathy with lactic acid dehydrogenase (LDH) elevation and exercise intolerance
7. Sickle cell anemia with vaso-occlusive crisis and pulmonary hypertension
8. Heartworm disease with right-sided ventricular dilation and tricuspid regurgitation
9. Chronic venous insufficiency with right atrial dilation and edema
10. Pulmonary embolism with right atrial dilation and tricuspid regurgitation.
